full_text:
Re: Media inquiry - NY Post - seeking update on Epstein
From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
To [b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/07/30 12:44
Subject: Re: Media inquiry - NY Post - seeking update on Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm, IMAGE.HTM
[b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Here is the final version I'm sending to [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) as well who are asking for an update.
You're welcome to send this to him or other reporters
We considered using new language but we realized the language from our original response last week (repeated below mostly) covers everything being asked - medical status and conditions of confinement (which we interpret as including where he's housed within an institution).
[b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353-[b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
> > [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 7/30/2019 12:26 PM > > >
go with this...
Reporter: [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) NY Post
Question (reporter emailed OPA & MCC NY):
Can you provide an update on inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein, Register Number: 76318-054, who is being held without bail at New York MCC?
Specifically, what is the status of the investigation into the injuries he sustained to his neck last week, and where is he currently housed?
Please let me know asap.
Proposed Response:
Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement.
[b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Chief, Office of Public Affairs
Federal Bureau of Prisons
U.S. Department of Justice
202-514-[b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Page 2434
DOJ-OGR-00025261

Re: Media inquiry - NY Post - seeking update on Epstein
From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
To [b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/07/30 12:44
Subject: Re: Media inquiry - NY Post - seeking update on Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm, IMAGE.HTM

Here is the final version I'm sending to [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) as well who are asking for an update.
You're welcome to send this to him or other reporters
We considered using new language but we realized the language from our original response last week (repeated below mostly) covers everything being asked - medical status and conditions of confinement (which we interpret as including where he's housed within an institution).

Reporter: [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) NY Post
Question (reporter emailed OPA & MCC NY):
Can you provide an update on inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein, Register Number: 76318-054, who is being held without bail at New York MCC?
Specifically, what is the status of the investigation into the injuries he sustained to his neck last week, and where is he currently housed?
Please let me know asap.

Proposed Response:
Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement.

Chief, Office of Public Affairs
Federal Bureau of Prisons
U.S. Department of Justice
202-514-[b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions of personal information marked as [b)(6); (b)(7)(C)]. The document appears to be an email chain discussing a media inquiry regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status at MCC New York.
